name: A gentle clean-up of Gmail and Facebook
description: Removes a few annoyances that have popped up in the Gmail and Facebook UIs over the years. Inspired by bits of Gmelius, as well as a desire to make FB less "pushy", respectively. Still a work in progress!

user.name: skaulana
user.about: Hi there! So I guess we both like stylesheets, huh?

additional_info: Specific changes made on each site are commented in the CSS, which you can easily view from within Stylish. It's a subjective set (for instance, keeping birthdays and page recommendations visible in Facebook's right hand pane, but hiding suggested items) but in general I think you'll find they're all fairly benign changes. :)
